comment: Definitely woody with a more vanilla finish.

Beautiful nose. Apple pie,
Fruits, wood and vanilla

Palate spicy with some
Whie pepper and woody then the vanilla comes finishing with smoke

Finish long and warm with rising smoke...

Nosing: young and sharp, fresh oak and raisins

Flavour sharp peppery fire burn, iodine and oiliness

Finish: oak woody finish is most distinct

Nov 2019.
Clear medium dark gold to amber.
Medium small tulip.
Aromatic vanilla, heavily roasted coffee beans, sweet spicy, old leather, honey, toffee, and forest tree bark in the bouquet.
Full body with lots of wood spicy, toasted bread Christmas cake, tiramisu, and caramel brûlée in palate.
Good balance medium long finish.
55%abv.

Full of punch as it has high abv, but surprisingly still considered smooth.
Pack of flavor, vanillic and wood aroma, lingering spices at the end.
Intense, sweet, fits the name well. Being young and 50% definitely makes it strong but it’s great with some water. 93
